document.masterDocTitle: New species and synonymies in Xenopygus Bernhauer (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and synonymies in Xenopygus Bernhauer (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gastrisus cribrum
Fauvel, 1891 : 107
new synonymy
.
Xenopygus petilicolis
Caron and Castro, 2016 : 75
new synonymy
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material. Holotype of
Gastrisus punctatus
, male, with labels: “Type [round label with red border]” / “Amazons, S. Paulo” / “S. America, Brazil” / “Sharp Coll. 1905-313” / “
Gastrisus punctatus
♂ Type D.S.”. Deposited in BMNH. Holotype of
Gastrisus cribrum
, female, with labels: “San Esteban [Venezuela], E. Simon III.[18]88” / “ cribrum Fvl. ” / “R. I. Sc.N.B. 17.479 Coll. et det A. Fauvel”. In the collection of IRSNB. Type materials for
X. petilicolis
as indicated in
Caron et al. (2016)
.

Remarks. It is worth pointing out that Sharp (1876) and Fauvel (1891) had each indicated that the species they were describing as new was similar in head structure to
Xenopygus analis
.
